scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend ci --omit=dev=false && npm --prefix frontend run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join('frontend','dist'); const dest=path.join('server','frontend','dist'); fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); (function copy(s,d){ for(const e of fs.readdirSync(s,{withFileTypes:true})){ const sp=path.join(s,e.name); const dp=path.join(d,e.name); if(e.isDirectory()){ fs.mkdirSync(dp,{recursive:true}); copy(sp,dp);} else { fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp);} } })(src,dest); console.log('Copied frontend/dist -> server/frontend/dist');"
